lines.text: You want to go to Leo's party - the man who killed you?
If I were not Hungarian, I would be speechless.
All that screaming in five different languages - four of which I couldn't even understand!
Turn down the air conditioning in the bowling alley.
You speak in riddles, my Sphinx.
About a half-mile down the beach.
How long have you lived there?
About eight years since my parents bought the place. Their names are Ralph and Helen Mason. Say, you alright?
Could-could I ask you a question? Uh, you are a girl, aren't you? I mean you've always been a girl, never anything but a girl?

[Amused. Raises her right hand]
Hmm. I swear it.
Did you know Charlie Sorel had a wife?
